main event: A male civilian observed an elliptical grey object flying at a speed of 400-600 mph in Phoenix, Arizona on July 7, 1947.
interesting points: The object was observed spiraling down from an altitude of 5000 feet to 2000 feet before ascending at a 45Â° angle., The sighting lasted approximately 60 seconds., Witness claimed the object produced a noise like a jet on approach before its appearance, but made no sound while in view., The size of the object was estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter., The witness attempted to photograph the object twice, achieving one visible image of the object against the clouds.
witness description: A male civilian who observed the object from the ground.
